messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] teachers video card
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 04/04/2000 6:20:42 PM Pacific Daylight Time, MorelFam@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 04/04/2000 6:20:42 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
MorelFam@... writes:

<<
i dont know how big the chain is, but if you have a Hollywood Video nearby,
listen to this. home educators can get a VIT "very important teacher" card
for free, which then allows us to borrow any video that we will use for
educational purposes! FREE! no charge, nothing, nada. pretty great
service, eh? they have travel videos, documentaries, and of course all the
>>

Did you have to show some kind of ID to get this card? I was thinking
about making one up on my computer and maybe laminating it. Do
teacher ID cards have pics on them? Thanks
Kathy
